sense.def:
To have a choice
pomeni imeti možnost, da izbiramo med več stvarmi.

seg.quote: There's a choice of eleven sports.

sense.def:
One's choice
je stvar ali stvari, ki smo jih izbrali.

seg.quote: He congratulated the chef on his choice of dishes.

sense.def:
Z besedo
choice
opišemo stvari visoke kakovosti.

The thing or person of one's choice
je stvar ali oseba, ki si jo izberemo.

seg.quote: She was prevented from marrying the man of her choice.

sense.def:
To have no choice but to do something
pomeni, da se nečemu ne moremo izogniti.

cit.quote: ne imeti druge izbire, biti prisiljen

seg.quote: The President had no choice but to agree.
